description_for_human: Universal MCP server for AI agents to interact with any* blockchain via natural language and plugins. Supports swaps, bridges, gas, staking, lending, and more across Ethereum, Arbitrum, Base, Polygon, BSC, and testnets.
description_for_model: Universal MCP server for AI agents to interact with any* blockchain via natural language and plugins. Supports swaps, bridges, gas, staking, lending, and more across Ethereum, Arbitrum, Base, Polygon, BSC, and testnets.
